predicate.note: Frames file for 'expect' based on first so-and-so of sentences from large corpus

example.name: nominal arg1
example.text: Portfolio managers expect further declines in interest rates.

example.name: sentential arg1
example.text: The company expects *trace* to obtain regulatory approval.

example.name: passivised
example.text: Regulatory approval is expected soon by everyone

example.name: passivised with extraction
example.text: The Senate isn't expected *trace* to act until next week.
example.arg: [The Senate] [*trace* to act until next week]
example.note: What is expected is the Senate's acting; thus, the syntactic movement is undone in the argument structure.

example.name: discourse-connective
example.text: As *trace* expected *trace*, John said something stupid again.
